concept.title: Metric Rules and Alerts
concept.shortdesc: Metric rules define the statistics that you want to gather about pipeline and stage performance, such as a high rate of error records or batches taking too long to process. You can also create alerts based on the metric rules.

conbody.p: metric alertsoverviewmonitoringmetric alertsMetric alerts display in the console in monitor mode. You can also configure a metric alert to send email to all email addresses associated with the pipeline.
You can configure metric rules and alerts when you configure or monitor the pipeline. Metric rules and alerts take effect after you enable them.

The provides a set of metric rules and alerts for a pipeline. By default, they are not active. You can edit, delete, or activate the rules and alerts. You can also create custom metric rules and alerts.
